mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with correct punctuations.  "go then," Said the ant, "And dance winter away."

options.a: "Go then," Said the ant, "And dance winter away."
options.b: "Go then" Said the Ant, and "dance winter away."
options.c: "Go then," said the ant, "and dance winter away."
options.d: "Go then". Said the Ant, "and dance Winter away."
